the period of time after the end of the sports season, often a time when the teams that have won the most matches play against each other to find a winner: The Indians have won three straight one-run games in the postseason. More teams now have a chance to reach the postseason.
More examplesFewer examplesThey lost the match and missed the postseason for the first time in six years.Will they become the first team to go through all four rounds of the postseason undefeated? They entered the postseason as the best team.
